content.text: I'm doing well! I got a new job working with the love of my life on a new project.
Oh that sounds awesome! I got a new job too, I'm a wedding planner who is always on the lookout for new business opportunities.
That's so cool! Do you like it?
Yeah, it's a lot of work, but I love it! I recently finished building my new gaming computer.
That's awesome! I love gaming too. I play in the church choir and try to eat healthy foods and exercise regularly.
That's really cool! I just love summer walking and reading.
Yeah, I have a lizard named Ragini.
That's so cool! I love lizards.
